## Code Style Preferences

- Focus on readability over performance unless specified
- Write comprehensive commit messages with context
- Always run type checking and linting before commits
- Prefer functional components in React
- Use TypeScript strictly (no `any` types unless absolutely necessary)

## Development Workflow

1. Always check for existing patterns in the codebase before implementing new features
2. Run tests and type checking before committing
3. Update documentation when adding new features
4. Keep commits atomic - one logical change per commit
